scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run dev" "npm --prefix home run dev" "npm --prefix shop run dev" "npm --prefix header run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run build" "npm --prefix home run build" "npm --prefix shop run build" "npm --prefix header run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix checkout run start" "npm --prefix home run start" "npm --prefix shop run start" "npm --prefix header run start"
